main event: A bright, stationary object was observed for about 20 minutes in the sky over Guntersville, Alabama on March 31, 1966.
interesting points: The object was elongated in shape and did not appear to be a star.
The object was silvery or metallic in appearance.
The object did not move or make any sound.
This was the first time the witness had observed such an object.
The sighting occurred around 6:00 PM while the witness was observing the sunset.
